properties.areaDesc: Tallapoosa, AL; Chambers, AL; Elmore, AL; Randolph, AL; Macon, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:38AM CST until February 18 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tallapoosa River At
Wadley...and the Tallapoosa River at the Tallapoosa Water Plant...

.Elevated water levels continue on the Tallapoosa River due to heavy
rainfall observed last week. Although levels have dropped below
flood stage at the Tallapoosa Water Plant this morning, new
forecasts have revised levels upward to now rise above flood
stage once again by Wednesday evening. Additional rainfall expected
this week will lead to those rises. Therefore, the Flood Warning
remains in effect at the Tallapoosa Water Plant.

Meanwhile, forecast river stages at Wadley are expected to drop
below flood stage soon, as early as tonight. The Flood Warning will
remain in effect at Wadley until that time.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tallapoosa River At Wadley.
* until Tuesday afternoon...or until the Warning is cancelled.
* AT  8:00 AM Monday the stage was 13 feet.
* Flood stage is 13 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
after midnight tonight .
* Impact...At 13 feet...Flooding of pasture lands in the area occurs
and cattle and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground if
higher stages are forecast.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
